reviewText:
Amazon says this DVD is 21 minutes long; it is barely half that at 10:52.

I would give it one star total for that, it's not worth the money at just 10 minutes long, BUT I gave it two more stars because what little content it has is very good. This is Varitek being interviewed in college when he played at Georgia Tech, before he even made it to the majors.

Too bad it isn't longer and too bad Amazon isn't giving correct information. Makes me unlikely to buy any others and I was planning on buying quite a few. I don't want to buy any more at a dollar a minute.
